snippet: At 80, I often feel life is about to begin, only to realize it is almost over.
abstract: Op-Ed article by neurology Prof Oliver Sacks reflects on both the joys and regrets of his life as he prepares to turn 80.
lead_paragraph: At 80, I often feel life is about to begin, only to realize it is almost over.

headline.main: The Joy of Old Age. (No Kidding.)
